metadata.title: CVE-2020-25636 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Ansible Base when using the aws_ssm connection pluginas there is no namespace separation for file transfers. Files are writtendirectly to the root bucket, making possible to have collisions whenrunning multiple ansible processes. This issue affects mainly the serviceavailability.

criterions.comment: ansible: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
